entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few flurries mixed with rain showers early this evening and ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 4 cm over western sections. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
